entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late this evening then clearing. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
